item.title: Pump Low PRESS Indication Systems – Center and Right Pump Indication Systems

remarks.para: One in each hydraulic system may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Associated low SYS PRESS light is operative, and
Associated pump is verified to be operative before each departure.
Select operable HYD Pumps ON and verify SYS PRESS Lights extinguished before each flight.

placard.para: Placard affected Hydraulic Pump Low PRESS light(s) on Hydraulic Control panel "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
